Simple Graphs.grid_config: "x x" " y y " " color color " " information_attributes information_attributes " " title_attribute plot_type " " multiline_plot boxplot_scatter_points " "title y_label "  "trendline trendline " " log_scale_y_axis use_plotly_api " " plotly_api_key plotly_user " " name id_name "

trendline.help: Plots a linear (ols) or non-linear (lowess) trendline on scatter plot.

color.help: Columns to group data, if required.

y.help: Columns corresponding Y-Axis of graph. If Line Plot, it will plot one line for each column

Simple Graphs.help: Plots line, bar, box and scatter graphs.

title.help: Graph title. Only if there are multiple graphs in a single plot, or when there is only 1 graph.

y_label.help: Graph y label. Only if there are multiple graphs in a single plot, or when there is only 1 graph.

information_attributes.help: Attributes that will be used as additional informations of each point on the map

title_attribute.help: Attribute that will be used as title of each point on the map

color_attribute.help: Attribute to color each point on the map

size_attribute.help: Attribute to define the size of each point on the map

location_attribute.help: When using choropleth, defines which attribute contains city or state name.

information_attributes.help: Attributes that will be used as additional informations of each point on the map.

title_attribute.help: Attribute that will be used as title of each point on the map.

Geo Plot.help: Plots a geographic graph from a data stream.

Print Data.grid_config: " limit_data print_data_schema " " sort_attributes sort_attributes " " sort_conditions sort_conditions " " id_name name "

limit_data.help: Defines how much records will be displayed, up to 50 records.

sort_attributes.help: Attributes which your sample will be sorted.

sort_conditions.help: Conditions to sort (ASC for ascending and DESC for descending). You can have one global condition or one condition to each sort_attributes.
